original_title: Rock 'N Learn: Getting Ready for Kindergarten
overview: Jill and Joey are so excited about starting kindergarten! Your kids will get excited too, as they learn essential skills through fun songs, animated characters, and real children. Skills include colors, counting, tying shoes, following directions, holding a pencil, printing letters and numbers, listening, number recognition and printing numbers through ten, getting dressed, left/right directions, and more.  Ages 3 - 5.
title: Rock 'N Learn: Getting Ready for Kindergarten
